p:
All statistical analyses were conducted with the free statistical software R ver. 3.6.1
25 . We compared δ 13C, δ 15N, and TP between L. humile LH1 and each of the other supercolonies. Since the distributions of δ 13C, δ 15N, and TP were significantly different from a normal distribution (Shapiro–Wilk test, p < 0.05) and showed unequal variance among the four L. humile supercolonies (Levene's test, p < 0.05), differences in the isotopic ratio among supercolonies were assessed by Mann–Whitney U test ( p < 0.05).
